text: Ebba Grön was a punk rock band from Rågsved in Sweden. It was active between 1977 and 1983. Vocalist and songwriter was Joakim Thåström. ==Discography== ===Albums=== * We're Only in It for the Drugs (1979) No. 21 (SWE) * Kärlek & uppror (1981) No. 5 (SWE) * Ebba Grön (1982) No. 1 (SWE) Category:Punk bands Category:Swedish rock music groups
title: Ebba Grön
